name: Hole.io Buster
description:
this game was inspired by the Hole.io game.

Hole vs Colors is a simple hyper casual game. Your goal is to get the white cubes into the hole. As easy as it may seem, it is also very difficult to master.

 to skip a level click "S" 

Features : 
✔ Easy to play, hard to master.
✔ +10 Levels
✔ Achievements
✔ Optimized for all devices
✔ Stunning Graphics
✔ Professional Design
